A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The actual rating for this movie is under %27 here is why: Rotten Tomatoes does not count scores under one half star and Disney carries so much weight that reviewers are afraid to speak the truth lest they ruin their relationship with the studio. This is not a pet theory\, it's obvious. Look at the overwhelming negative reviews here and especially on youtube. check out this video where a guy actually does the math:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWPAbKEmd5M

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Having said that....

This movie is perhaps THE greatest cinematic catastrophe of all time. Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy should never work again. God help me if I ever see either of them  in public. 

Ryan & Kathleen\,  if you are reading this\, remember\, it's a small world after all.
